obf is leftover from sbf  so u have to wait for ppl to finish selecting for sbf first then obf will openobf is not a 24/7 thing

Just wondering  for shortlease 2Rm  if the flat is returned to HDB for whatever reason (eg death) after being lived in for a few years  which category will such flats be classified under? Repossessed flats? And how will they be offered to the public again  SBF or OBF ?
Got a curious qn.If person A has an out of supply queue no. for oct 2023 but a within supply queue no for dec 2023  gets called up for Oct 2023  is he/she able to reject the Oct 2023?
Will it be considered a rejection and affect dec 2023 queue no.?
Is there still obf these days? Sbf also hard to get. Oversubscribed
Sbf limited supply thats why oversubscribe more compare to bto
You rejectYour second Q number will be cancel and become second timer for a yearOr you put it cold down period for a. Year can't select any BTO SBFOnly resale
Only when HDB inform you no need to come due to some reason then you are saved
I mean ive been trying to apply sbf since 2022 but never get. Obf also never get notificition of launch these days. Maybe its a thing prior 2022
Yeah. Sbf use to be 2 times a year. Then they screw up last year. No sbf in nov 2023. Damn
You can reject Oct 2023 bto only if total number of units left is 10 <When is your turn
Please go to correct group .

Want to know hdb loan eligibility is based on salary when signed lease or key collection. Its could be 5years apart and applicants salary can be folds up since signed lease.
As long as you can settle the unit price in full on the appointment before key collection  youâ€™re good to go.

During HFE application will tell you how much HDB loanOn first appointment will tell you about how much is your loan and everything ( more or less confirm)3 months before key collection just to see if you can repay the loan than HDB will processElse HDB loan maybe cancel you have to come out with cashIf not cash you can't collect key
